HomePageHero.name: Mahdi Pakravan
HomePageHero.description: Whether you're learning web development or looking for professional web design, I’m here with innovative design, secure development, and expert mentorship.

services.heading: My Services
services.description: I believe it's my duty to share my knowledge and experience in the web development journey with you. In this section, I offer services for those passionate about this field. You can also download my resume below to learn more about me.

websiteDevelopment.title: Web Development Training
websiteDevelopment.description: If you’d like a private tutor to learn web development, I can help you. Just send me a message on Telegram, and we can discuss your learning path.

websiteDesign.title: Instant Debugging / Quick Consultation
websiteDesign.description: For times when you encounter an issue in your project and need immediate assistance, you can reach out to me to resolve the problem quickly.

websiteSecurity.title: Project Development
websiteSecurity.description: If you have a project, you can count on me! I can assist with all phases of development, including design, coding, maintenance, and security. Just click the button below.

websiteMentorship.title: Mentorship
websiteMentorship.description: In this mentorship program, you can ask anything you’d like—whether it's about your current company, your career path, resume reviews, or mock interviews. Just click the link on the website.

FeedbacksSection.title: Feedbacks
FeedbacksSection.description: Your feedback means the world to me. Here, you'll find reviews from my clients and collaborators who have shared their experience working with me.

feedback.comment: Mahdi has a very deep knowledge of Frontend Development and making websites. I worked with him, and he is fantastic. I highly recommend Mahdi!
feedback.name: Mo.Ali Ali Panah

PortfolioSection.description: In this section, you can explore some of the projects I've worked on and the results achieved with my clients. Each project tells a unique story, and by clicking on them, you can learn more.

ContactMeSection.name: Name
ContactMeSection.loremText: If you have any questions or want to start a new collaboration, I’m always ready to get in touch. You can reach out to me via the form below, and I’ll respond as soon as possible. Whether it’s about a new project or seeking advice, I’d be happy to collaborate with you and turn your ideas into reality.

FooterSection.description: Focusing on the discipline, colors, and emotions of your brand, I create a website that not only reflects your values but also provides an unforgettable experience for users.
FooterSection.copyRight: Design + Development + Security with ❤ by Mpakravan
